data.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: I am not afraid... I was born to do this
data.author: Joan of Arc

data.quote: The more man meditates upon good thoughts, the better will be his world and the world at large
data.author: Confucius

data.quote: What is called genius is the abundance of life and health
data.author: David Henry Thoreau

data.quote: A goal is a dream with deadline
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream
data.author: Les Brown

data.quote: There is no passion to be found playing small -in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: To know oneself, one should assert oneself
data.author: Albert Camus

data.quote: Always desire to learn something useful
data.author: Sophocles
